column1: '''Thellamie''' was the name of a country in the poem ''[[Errantry]]'' by [[Bilbo Baggins]].<ref>{{AB
column2: Errantry}}</ref>  The name was not actually [[Elvish]] but an invention in the Elvish style.<ref>{{AB

column1: It is unknown if Thellamie referred to an actual country in [[Middle-earth]], or if it was just an invention by the poet.
